visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a line chart with the following specifications: Chart type is 'line', chart title is 'Monthly Sales Data', axes and labels should have a dark gray color with a font size of 14px, data series includes two series named '2022 Sales' and '2023 Sales' with corresponding data, custom colors for the series are '#008000' and '#FFA500', and additional configurations include a white background, a legend positioned at the bottom, and a margin of 50 pixels around the chart.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a line chart with specific visual and functional attributes. The chart type is set to 'line', and it includes a title 'Monthly Sales Data' styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 18px. The x-axis and y-axis labels are styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 14px. The data series includes two sets of monthly sales data for the years 2022 and 2023, respectively, with custom colors '#008000' and '#FFA500'. The chart has a white background and a margin of 50 pixels around its edges. Additionally, the legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart, centered horizontally.
